physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Physical examination including neck palpation was entirely normal.

After 10 ECTs, she developed bilateral upper limb asterixis lasting for approximately 2 hours. The EEG showed generalized slowing, indicating a pattern consistent with metabolic encephalopathy. Plasma calcium was elevated at 12.0 mg/dl two weeks after the 10th ECT.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Calcium levels increased from 10.8 mg/dl at admission to 12.0 mg/dl two weeks after the 10th ECT.
